import React from 'react' import './Item.css' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' const Item = (props) => { return ( window.scrollTo(0, 0)} style={{textDecoration: 'none'}} to={`/product/${props.id}`}>

{props.name}

{props.new_price} $

{props.old_price} $

) } export default Item
